NK010(tha)027:0: snga 'gyur bka' ma'i bdud rtsi gsang nan gyi 'grel ba bzhugs /
NK010(tha)027:1: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK010(tha)027:2: bdud rtsi gsang nan gyi don ni /
NK010(tha)027:4: mi bskyod ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la bsnam du gsol //
NK010(tha)027:5: zhes mi bskyod pa ni mi 'gyur ba'i don dang /
NK010(tha)027:6: de'i rang bzhin ye shes las gzhan du mi 'pho
NK010(tha)027:7: bas sdug bsngal mtha' dag dang bral ba'i bde ba
NK010(tha)027:8: chen po ste / gang gi bla na 'gro ba'i
NK010(tha)027:9: chos gzhan med pas rnam pa thams cad pa'i mchog
NK010(tha)027:10: dang ldan pa'i ro la zag pa med pa'i shes
NK010(tha)027:11: rab kyis myong ba'i rkyen gyis /
NK010(tha)027:12: thob bya 'thob pa'i don la bsnam du gsol /
NK010(tha)027:13: zhes sangs rgyas rnams la dgyes pa bskyed pa'o //
NK010(tha)027:14: rkang pa gnyis pa sogs pa ni /
NK010(tha)027:15: byang chub sems dpa'i bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang ba'i phyir /
NK010(tha)027:16: chags pa med pa'i bde mchog kun tu myong mdzad bzhes shing bsnam du gsol //
NK010(tha)027:18: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod spyi dang /
NK010(tha)027:19: khyad par rdo rje theg pa'i dbang gsum las byung ba'i bde mchog de nyid /
NK010(tha)027:20: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kas spangs pa'i nyan thos
NK010(tha)027:21: rnams 'gog bden tsam po ba'i byang chub las sad
NK010(tha)027:23: rang rang gi rigs kyi yum dang mnyam par rol
NK010(tha)027:24: nas ma chags mi chags chags pa med pa'i bde
NK010(tha)027:25: ba chen po'i ye shes mchog gi bdag nyid can
NK010(tha)027:26: dus re 'ga' ba las 'das pa'i rnam pa kun
NK010(tha)027:27: tu kha sbyor yan lag bdun gyi bdag nyid du
NK010(tha)027:28: nyams su myong bar bskul ba'i don du dam tshig
NK010(tha)027:29: bdud rtsi sgra bcas su 'phyar nas bzhes shing bsnam
NK010(tha)027:30: du gsol / zhes go 'phang gang zhig bdag gir mdzad par bskul ba'o //
NK010(tha)027:31: mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol zhing dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol //
NK010(tha)027:32: byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig /
NK010(tha)027:33: ces pas de lta bu'i thabs kyi mthar phyin pa
NK010(tha)027:34: de nyid nyan thos la sogs pas thos su'ang mi
NK010(tha)027:35: rung bas mchog tu gsang ba'i bde ba chen po
NK010(tha)027:36: ste / chos nyid gang la rtag tu rol zhing /
NK010(tha)027:37: de ltar rol pa'i rjes thob thams cad snying rje
NK010(tha)027:38: chen po 'ba' zhig tu 'char bas dam bcas rang
NK010(tha)027:39: rgyal rnams gzhan don la bskul /
NK010(tha)027:40: gzhan rnams dbang du byed pa nyid gtso bor gyur
NK010(tha)027:41: pa'i phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'jig rten sgrol ba
NK010(tha)027:42: la brtson no // de phyir byang chub skye gnas
NK010(tha)027:43: te rnam thar sgo gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje
NK010(tha)027:44: btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde mchog dam pa'i dbyings las
NK010(tha)027:45: gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing 'pho chags med pa'i don
NK010(tha)027:46: gyis mi nyams pa dga' ba bzhi'i ye shes la
NK010(tha)027:47: rol pa chen po'i zlos gar mdzod cig ces zhu
NK010(tha)027:48: bde'i ye shes bskyed pa la bskul ba yin no
NK010(tha)027:49: la brtson no // // zhen cing chags pa'i mtha' la nyon mongs rno brkams gzir ba yis //
NK010(tha)027:50: myong bde bde mchog brgyad dang ldan pas thabs kyis sku la smre bar mdzod //
NK010(tha)027:51: 'gro kun tshangs par spyod pa'i byang chub sgo mor lam ston cing //
NK010(tha)027:52: bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig /
NK010(tha)027:54: sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK010(tha)027:56: 'dod pa la chags pa'i mtha' gnyis kyis nyon mongs pa'i dbal rno brkams chags kyis gzir na /
NK010(tha)027:57: srid pa'i 'dod chags kyi myong bde tha mal pa
NK010(tha)027:58: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin can du gnas pa de dag
NK010(tha)027:59: / rdo rje theg pa'i thabs lam zab mo'i dga'
NK010(tha)027:60: bzhi lugs 'byung bzhi dang lugs ldog bzhi ste bde
NK010(tha)027:61: mchog brgyad ldan gyi bdag nyid la sbyor ba'i byed
NK010(tha)027:62: po ni lha mo dga' ster gnas ster ma khyod
NK010(tha)027:63: las gzhan du med pas dam tshig gi bdud rtsi
NK010(tha)027:64: gsang nan ni bzhes la thabs kyi sku la smre
NK010(tha)027:66: yum gyis yab la zhu bde'i ye shes bskyed par bskul zhing /
NK010(tha)027:67: de ltar dang du bzhes pa'i rgyu 'bras sems can gyi khams la smin te /
NK010(tha)027:68: 'gro ba kun gyi srid pa'i 'dod pa sngags kyi
NK010(tha)027:69: thabs lam zab mo la brten nas yang dag par
NK010(tha)027:70: sbyongs pas / ma chags pa la chags pa med //
NK010(tha)027:71: de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin //
NK010(tha)027:72: zhes pa ltar 'dzag bde'i rgyun lam bcad pa tsam
NK010(tha)027:73: la ma ltos par 'dod chags rnam dag so sor
NK010(tha)027:74: rtog pa'i ye shes su shar ba'i tshangs spyod chen
NK010(tha)027:75: po'i byang chub sgo mor lam ston cig ces /
NK010(tha)027:76: thar pa bstan pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi la bskul ba'o //
NK010(tha)027:77: de lta bu'i bde mchog gi bdud rtsi ni thabs
NK010(tha)027:78: khyad par can 'di la ma bsten par 'byung ba
NK010(tha)027:79: med pas / khyad par med pa ste sems can
NK010(tha)027:80: gyi khams rnam pa thams cad la stsol zhig ces
NK010(tha)027:81: med pas / pa ste / nyin bzhin bram ze gsod pa dang //
NK010(tha)027:82: mtshams med lnga ni byed pa kun //
NK010(tha)027:85: zhes pa 'di yang zhabs drung yang steng pa 'jigs med dga' ba'i ngor /
NK010(tha)027:86: rig pa 'dzin pa 'jigs med gling pas don bsdu
NK010(tha)027:87: gtso bor bton nas yud tsam la blo thog nas
